document.full_text: chicago's marian hossa scored in overtime to give the blackhawks a 3-2 win over his former team detroit on monday, boosting the stanley cup champions' hopes of making this season's playoffs.
document.title: marian hossa lifts blackhawks over wings
lines_and_colors: chicago's marian hossa scored in overtime to give the blackhawks a 3-2 win over his former team detroit on monday, boosting the stanley cup champions' hopes of making this season's playoffs.
